summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Google Sheets synchronization system with manual modification tracking

fixed_bugs.description: Pydantic model was filtering out manually_modified, manually_modified_at, manually_modified_by fields from API responses
fixed_bugs.fix: Added manually_modified fields to Appointment model

passed_tests: Creation of appointments simulating Google Sheets import
Manual modification of imported appointments adds manually_modified flag
Manual edit preservation logic for Google Sheets sync
Database storage of manual edits with proper sheet_identifier
Appointment preservation check for manually modified appointments
